conclusion: Identify the given values: Length of the rails, inclination angle, magnetic induction strength, mass of rods, resistance of rods, applied force, gravitational acceleration, Joule heat in rod a, initial velocity of rod a
Calculate the magnetic force on rod a using the formula F_m = B * I * L * sin(theta)
Calculate the frictional force on rod a using the formula F_f = mu * N
Calculate the net force on rod a using the formula F_net = F_m - F_f
Use the equation of motion to calculate the velocity of rod a
Assume the velocity of rod b is the same as rod a
Calculate the final velocity of rod b using the formula v_b = v_a + F * t
Assume the final velocity of rod b is the same as rod a
Calculate the final speed of rod b using the formula v_b = v_a + F * t
Assume the final velocity of rod b is the same as rod a
The final speed of rod b is -0.267 m/s
